code: import styles from"../Styles/MobileBottomNav.module.scss";import GetIcon from"../Components/GetIcon";import MobileCategories from"../Components/MobileCategories";import{useState}from"react";import MobileBasket from"../Components/MobileBasket";import clsx from"clsx";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MobileBottomNav=()=>{const[currentComponent,setCurrentComponent]=useState("");const[navIsOpen,setNavIsOpen]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:clsx(styles.bottomNav,navIsOpen?styles.fullHeight:styles.removeHeight),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.content,children:(()=>{switch(currentComponent){case"categories":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MobileCategories,{setNavIsOpen:setNavIsOpen});case"basket":return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MobileBasket,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{});}})()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.navContainer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.navItem,onClick:()=>{setCurrentComponent("");setNavIsOpen(false);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GetIcon,{icon:"BsHouseFill",size:20})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.navItem,onClick:()=>{setCurrentComponent("categories");setNavIsOpen(oldState=>!oldState);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GetIcon,{icon:"BsList",size:20})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.navItem,onClick:()=>{setCurrentComponent("basket");setNavIsOpen(oldState=>!oldState);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GetIcon,{icon:"BsCartFill",size:20})})]})]});};export default MobileBottomNav;
